originalText.text: Thank you Natalia for your great job! After 7 months my hair has deserved this excellent improvement! I really love how I look right now. Very professional! Love my air touch and new haircut üíù Highly recommend! Natalia has a great experience and works very fast.

text.text: Thank you Natalia for your great job! After 7 months my hair has deserved this excellent improvement! I really love how I look right now. Very professional! Love my air touch and new haircut üíù Highly recommend! Natalia has a great experience and works very fast.

originalText.text: I came in with an appointment with Natalya and was blown away. I asked for highlights and that id exactly what I got. Natalya was patient, friendly, professional, and an overall phenomenal person to work with. She made sure that I was happy with the results, she made me feel comfortable, and she also offered complimentary drinks. She really cared about how much time and effort she put into my hair. I could not be more happy. The salon looked great and everything was great. If you are looking for highlights or a balayage, definitely ask for Natalya. She really is the best of the best.

originalText.text:
I had a terrible experience at this salon with Kim as my stylist. I specifically went in for highlights (which I have gotten with Kim before) and Kim assured me that my hair could handle it. However, after the appointment, my hair was left extremely damaged and broken. It's clear that Kim didn't take proper care of my hair and didn't have the expertise she claimed.

Not only did Kim leave my hair damaged and broken, but she also got the color wrong three times. Despite me clearly expressing that I did not want ashy tones, she managed to turn my hair a grayish brown (I came in blonde). When I expressed my dissatisfaction, she brushed it off and basically said, "Oh well, I have another client." This lack of professionalism and disregard for my wishes made the entire experience even worse. As a result, I had to go to another salon and spend a lot of money for a color correction and a repairing treatment (luckily they fixed my color). I'm truly disappointed with Kim's service and the overall experience at this salon. Avoid at all costs.
(In the pictures I added, you can see the length of the broken hair compared to my actual length. This chemical breakage is all throughout my hair.)

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting K&S Salon.
It was a truly remarkable experience. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with a warm and friendly atmosphere that instantly put me at ease.
The salon is beautifully decorated and gives a sense of sophistication and style. The team at K&S Salon takes great pride in creating a welcoming environment for their clients.
As for the hairstyling services, I could not have been happier. Nick was not only highly skilled but also took the time to listen to my preferences and concerns. Nick offered valuable suggestions and advice to help me achieve my desired look.
What truly sets K&S Salon apart is their attention to detail and commitment to customer satisfaction.
In conclusion, I recommend K & S Salon to anyone needing top-notch hairstyling services. It is a place where you will not only leave looking your best but feel valued as a customer. I'll be returning for future appointments, and I'm confident you'll be just as satisfied with your experience as I was.

originalText.text:
I am thrilled to share my recent visit to K&S Salon. I simply have to express my gratitude for the top-notch service I received, which deserves recognition. From the moment I stepped in, I was greeted by a warm and welcoming team who made me feel right at home. Their customer service is exceptional, and they went above and beyond to ensure I left feeling satisfied. The master hairdressers are incredibly skilled and knowledgeable, and I was amazed by the results. I am grateful to have found this hidden gem and will certainly be recommending it to everyone I know. I am already looking forward to my next appointment at K&S Salon, where I know I will be in good hands once again.
Thank you !!
